price: Yang demikian itu disebabkan karena sesungguhnya mereka mencintai kehidupan di dunia lebih dari akhirat dan bahwasanya Allah tiada memberi petunjuk kepada kaum yang kafir.
arabic: ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّهُمُ ٱسۡتَحَبُّواْ ٱلۡحَيَوٰةَ ٱلدُّنۡيَا عَلَى ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يَهۡدِي ٱلۡقَوۡمَ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: dhālika bi-annahumu is'taḥabbū al-ḥayata al-dun'yā ʿalā al-ākhirati wa-anna al-laha lā yahdī al-qawma al-kāfirīna
